entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Westlock
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries ending before morning then cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 8:44 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:44 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 8:44 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
